trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> property to determine which row changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個資料列變更。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which row state changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個資料列狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />，具有已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值，表示資料列上已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會使用參數值來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />，具有已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />，具有已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列上已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值，表示資料列上已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。
